name: Boracay Island and Other Philippine destinations.
description: Philippines is an archipelago composed of 7,107 islands. To where you can do your visit to travel and experience the beach, hot and humid weather, tropical greens, rivers and lakes, coral reefs, Filipino people and culture. As a Travel Planner, I offer customized travel itinerary depending on your budget, giving assistance to fellow travelers for them to explore some Philippine destinations for convenience and practicality and enjoyment.
